      • reportInvalidValueError

        public void reportInvalidValueError(java.lang.String element,
                                    java.lang.String fileName)
        Prints a warning message to the console, stating: the value of the given element is invalid. If possible, the current value will be looked up.
        Parameters:
        element - Element which contains an invalid value.
        fileName - File where the error occurred
